title: Kay Arthur - Living for God's Glory
description:
Kay Arthur - Precept Ministries
Beloved, the ball's in our court - either our nation lives for God's Glory, or that Glory will depart as it did in Israel! It already shows signs of waning in our country. We've lost our fear of God as we've forgotten Him and distorted His Word. We no longer know Him as He really is, according to the truth He recorded for us. We've exchanged His glory for things that don't profit, truth for lies. We've become a nation that fears and worships man. We need to return to God's glory and live in it! God commanded us to glorify Him in our bodies, which belong to Him because He purchased them with the blood of His Son. The world needs to see the difference Jesus Christ makes in those who believe this Gospel. 

Are you ready for this life? Are you prepared to live a life that glorifies God alone a life that can influence and even save our great nation? May the Lord empower you this moment to say "Yes!" with your whole heart, soul, mind, and strength. Living For God's Glory is designed to help you keep this commitment! May the Lord mightily bless you through this study of His Word.

************************************************************************************

Language: English / Video Format: FLV

01 Guarding the Glory of God
02 What Do You Trust In
03 Ichabod - The Name Below All Names
04 Glory or No Glory
05 When the Glory Departs
06 The Nation that Forgets God and Fears Man
07 Exchanging the Glory of the Incorruptible God
08 Full Potential in the Lord
09 The Inside Fix
10 Walk by the Spirit
11 I Finished the Work You Gave Me
12 Ordinary or Special
13 Transparent Glory
14 Suffering- The Pathway to Glory
15 Standing in the Presence of the Lord of Glory
